title: Ano Akogare Ga, Lens-Goshi Ni Somaru
description:
Description :
        Read manhwa "Ano Akogare ga, Lens-goshi ni Somaru" for free at Summary:After seeing a photo of a woman named Sena Haneda, actor Hayato Takamatsu makes up his mind to become a photographer. Shortly thereafter, he announces his retirement from acting to make his photography dreams come true. He has yet to photograph something as moving as that photo of Sena, however. One day, he meets a famous model and photographs her for a relationshipthemed magazine photo shoot. She's dropdead gorgeous, but is very stiff on set once the camera turns to her. She starts to worry she's upset Hayato but then Hayato gets an idea after he makes her smile on set! She later reveals to him that she's never dated anyone and asks him to show her what it's like. What will happen to the couple as they follow their sweet feelings of love?Alternative:Snapping the Perfect Shot of Sena, What is mangabuddy?mangabuddy is currently the largest manhwa website with thousands of high-quality manhwa.
